definition: to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
no first use (policy for nuclear weapons)/NFU

sentences.english: Corneal ulcers occur most often in patients who use extended-wear soft contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 角膜溃疡最常发生于长期使用软性角膜接触镜的病人。

sentences.english: More responsive page rendering using lazy frame construction.
sentences.chinese: 更多的反应型页面渲染使用懒人框架结构。

sentences.english: Resume breakpoint to support the proposal to use the software to download.
sentences.chinese: 建议使用支持断点续传的软件下载。
没人生来就会使用筷子。

sentences.english: The Research and Application of User Interface in CAID System;
sentences.chinese: 用户界面旋钮型的直观且易于使用。

sentences.english: But just 9 percent of those who use M.I.T. OpenCourseWare are educators.
sentences.chinese: 但是只有9%使用麻省理工开放课程的网友是教育者。

sentences.english: The terminal is used in conjunction with a photographic typesetter.
sentences.chinese: 这种终端与照相排版机一起使用。

sentences.english: The first use of cemented fragmental rock filling in China was conducted atTongkeng tin mine operated by Dachang Mine Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 大厂铜坑锡矿在国内率先使用块石砂浆胶结充填法。

sentences.english: Older singletons are using the sites as a way to find love.
sentences.chinese: 孤寡老人使用此类网站寻找真爱。

sentences.english: We recommend you to use the fist way of containing only one hole to play single note.
sentences.chinese: 我们推荐使用第一种方法，口含一孔吹单音。

sentences.english: It is often combined with elements of numerology .
sentences.chinese: 通常，风水还与占数学的原理结合起来使用。

sentences.english: I think the EDG probably uses a low astigmatism eyepiece design like the SE.
sentences.chinese: 我想EDG可能使用了象SE一样的低像散目镜设计。

sentences.english: Stellite 6 seating faces for long service life.
sentences.chinese: 钨铬钴合金6阀座面，使用寿命更长。

sentences.english: Large scaled geosciences software systems often use several dozens of types of data.
sentences.chinese: 大型的地质行业软件系统使用到多达几十种数据类型。

sentences.english: Before I got these, my allergies would turn into weeks-long sinus infections.
sentences.chinese: 在我开始使用前，过敏症状已变成持续几周的鼻炎。

sentences.english: These traditional disciplines and the use of bamboo weapons remain alive today.
sentences.chinese: 这些传统学科以及竹制武器的使用一直延续至今。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to use for the purpose of/to serve as
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
